[console_scripts]
nuitka3 = nuitka.__main__:main
nuitka3-run = nuitka.__main__:main

[distutils.commands]
bdist_nuitka = nuitka.distutils.DistutilCommands:bdist_nuitka
build_nuitka = nuitka.distutils.DistutilCommands:build
install_nuitka = nuitka.distutils.DistutilCommands:install

[distutils.setup_keywords]
build_with_nuitka = nuitka.distutils.DistutilCommands:setupNuitkaDistutilsCommands
